name: The Duke
description:
Become the Robin-hood of the 21st century.

Based on the Shakespearian play "Measure for Measure", The Duke will take you on a journey through the city of Gomorrah and its alternate dimensions. Take from the rich, and give to the poor.

Project creators:
Liangwei Zlwei, Carlo Leonardo, Dasha Kransnoselskaya, Reuben Shortland

Project process blog:

https://reubenterehu.wixsite.com/reubensgamedesign
